alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 12:41PM CST until January 09 at 1:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Jones County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 115 PM CST. * At 1240 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tuckers Crossing, or near Laurel, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mill Creek around 1250 PM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for southeastern Mississippi.
